page.title: 05Home Life Pets Fudge
page.content: {Stuart.} Fudge is my best friend's cat. I like Fudge quite a lot.Fudge has a sort of a stripy fur.Fudge's colour is black,white and ginger.One of Fudge's babies is called Felix and it's colour is ginger all over.Fudge has got sharp claws.When David and I watch the Smurfs on television every Sunday I stroke her all through the programme.I talk to Fudge.I say,"Are you going to play with Felix near the fire?" David and I play armies and when I pretend to be dead Fudge comes along and tigs me without David seeing.Fudge waits patiently at the door.
